subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Does anybody live near Austin TX?
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I'm an electrical engineer but I haven't gotten around to getting one of 
the RS units to play with yet.  Probably over the holidays ...

Zack

On Thu, 6 Dec 2007, Lance Oliver wrote:

> Hi Kristin,
>
> I'm not an electronic engineer either. I'm more of a tech as far as
> ideas and an experimenter with functional tools. However, Ron
> Ricketts is an engineering wizard and a friend. He lives in the
> Dallas area. Would you like for me to give him a contact email for
> you?
>
> Lance
>
> --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@...>
> wrote:
>>
>> Hi Lance.  I have family in the Dallas area and get there often.
> The kind
>> of help I am referring to is stuff like which tiny little spec on a
> board
>> goes to what wire?  Or how not to solder my fingers, etc.
>>
